Package com.esprit.utils

Class DataSource

java.lang.Object
com.esprit.utils.DataSource
public class DataSource extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for the RAKCHA application. Contains reusable functionality and common operations. Supports multiple database types including MySQL, SQLite, PostgreSQL, and H2.
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
RAKCHA Team
